translations: 使能器，使能者；促成者，赋能者

sentences.sentence: Labelling obesity as a disease "risks reducing autonomy, disempowering and robbing people of the intrinsic motivation that is such an important enabler of change."
sentences.translation: 把肥胖视为一种疾病“可能会降低人们的自主权，削弱并剥夺人们内在的动力，而这种动力是推动改变的重要因素。”
记录启用器支持 是 是

sentences.sentence: As I say, technology is just the enabler.
sentences.translation: 就像我刚才说的，技术只是用来创造条件的。
